OCC.DAT:
Template to Component Subtype of UFORM to be used to retrieve the UFORM-fields inherrited from a template. Has a relationship to UFORM.
How to use on a form: . Paint the UTPL_TO_CMP on the UFORM.
Only exists for the purpose of migration from Uniface 9
Only exists for the purpose of migration from Uniface 9
Component instance is attached; T=attached, F=detached
Only exists for the purpose of migration from Uniface 9
CHUI: clear terminal on running form from this form; Y=yes, N=no
Data access; N=read/write, L=read only, H=no edit, R=record form

Behavior: K=Keep defintion but drop data, S=keep all, Q=drop all
The option S only works when using the old 'run' command
